Global Community Charter School is a Harlem based Elementary School. We offer an arts-infused International Baccalaureate World School education for grades K-5.
We have integrated co-teaching arrangements in every classroom and provide holistic, whole-child support for our students that includes social/emotional support and emphasis on artistic expression. div.p: Aceptamos solicitudes para el año escolar 2020-21
Learn about our holistic approach to developing your child’s social, emotional, and academic growth.

GLOBAL COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL (GCCS), a Harlem-based International Baccalaureate (IB) World School that is innovative, project-based, culturally competent, and provides students with a comprehensive and rigorous curriculum that encourages critical and creative thinking.

div.h2: To our Global Community, CLICK HERE for updates and resources related to our School Closure due to COVID-19.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Apply for School Year 2020-21 and check our calendar for Tours & Open House events.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Come work with a strong group of educators!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: As an authorized International Baccalaureate World School, GCCS offers the Primary Years Program (PYP) tuition-free.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Thank you to all who came out to support our summer literacy program!

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-card combination-animation-slide-up individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: About us - Global Community Charter School (GCCS) is proud to be an International Baccalaureate (IB) World School, which authorizes us to offer the prestigious Primary Years Program (PYP) to our students. The Primary Years Program is for children aged 3 - 12 and nurtures and develops young students as caring, active participants in a lifelong journey of learning. The PYP framework is a fantastic tool for integrating project-based learning, critical thinking, and complex problem solving across our curriculum.

div.p: Global Community Charter School (GCCS) is proud to be an International Baccalaureate (IB) World School, which authorizes us to offer the prestigious Primary Years Program (PYP) to our students. The Primary Years Program is for children aged 3 - 12 and nurtures and develops young students as caring, active participants in a lifelong journey of learning. The PYP framework is a fantastic tool for integrating project-based learning, critical thinking, and complex problem solving across our curriculum.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-reveal individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: Our Key Design Elements - • International Baccalaureate (IB) World School• Two teachers in each classroom• Full Arts Integration• Multiple Forms of Evidence

div.p:
• International Baccalaureate (IB) World School
• Two teachers in each classroom
• Full Arts Integration
• Multiple Forms of Evidence

figure.blockquote: “GCCS is a place where everybody feels like they are at home. Leaders, families and students are in constant communication about the academic and social-emotional success of the children. The barrier between school and home is a blurred line - which is an amazing thing…!”
figure.figcaption: — Mary Paranac, Program Manager Springboard Collaborative

Curriculum & culture as described by our students, parents and staff."},"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe src=\"//www.youtube.com/embed/g_KI6_r8MUU?wmode=opaque&enablejsapi=1\" height=\"480\" width=\"854\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\">\n</iframe>","url":"https://youtu.be/g_KI6_r8MUU","width":854,"height":480,"providerName":"YouTube","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/g_KI6_r8MUU/hqdefault.jpg","resolvedBy":"youtube"}

div.div: Global Community Charter School, Harlem's K-5 International Baccalaureate School. Curriculum & culture as described by our students, parents and staff.

div.h3: GCCS is a high performing, high impact school and outperforms the district, city, and state in both Math & ELA testing.

div.data-settings: {"dataTableId":"5df02a549272dd7e063b3e1b","title":"2018-19 New York State Test Results: % of Students at or above Proficiency","legend":"visible","caption":"","chartType":1009,"palette":"Cool","flip":true,"dataTable":{"id":"5df02a549272dd7e063b3e1b","data":[[58.0,51.0],[50.0,48.0],[50.0,46.0],[29.0,30.0]],"seriesLabels":["Math","ELA"],"sampleLabels":["GCCS","New York State","New York City","District 5"]}}
div.h2: 2018-19 New York State Test Results: % of Students at or above Proficiency

div.p: 97% of families say that they feel respected by their child's teachers.
95% of families say that GCCS offers a wide enough variety of programs, classes, and activities to keep their child interested in school.
97% of families say that at GCCS their child is safe.
97% of families say that their school is kept clean.
95% of families say that they are satisfied with the education their child has received this year.
97% of families say that they are satisfied with the overall quality of their child's teachers this year.

a.data-description: Good morning all, we're continuing to offer grab and go meals with Red Rabbit at the locations listed here. If you're picking up at the West Harlem Group location on Lenox, please make sure they know you're there with your child for the school food program. You don't have to wait in a line. Thank you @myredrabbit

a.data-description: Families - important update for meal distribution effective tomorrow. Please take note of the new stops and times if you want to get free breakfast and lunch for kids. Two stops in Harlem, one in East Harlem, two in Lower East Side. Thank you @myredrabbit for making sure our kids get fed!

a.data-description: Good morning families, our friends at @myredrabbit will be out making food distribution stops again this week and will be at 153rd and 8th Ave at 10am instead of 8am. Remember that any child under 18 can get a breakfast and lunch so tell a neighbor, family or friend!

a.data-description: Good morning GCCS and #harlem families, our school food partner @myredrabbit is working with us to ensure that ANY child in Harlem who needs breakfast and lunch can get one. The Red Rabbit vans will be posted at various locations in Harlem each morning, and making a stop in the bronx as well. Please make a note of the locations and times for each drop off. We can potentially add more sites where there is a need. Please share with friends and neighbors @nokidhungryny @takecareofharlem @tbo.harlem @uptownbirdies @cb10 @galeabrewer @nysenbenjamin
